name: A Little Birdy Christmas
description:
A Little Birdy Christmas tells a short story about a little bird retrieving Christmas items his friends have lost in the forest. 

Preparing for Christmas is never easy, but it is up for this little bird to step up and save Christmas by setting out on a journey, avoiding any obstacles in its path, to collect ornaments to string on the tree and the item his friends lost. Not all heroes wear capes, but can the little bird rescue the holiday for its friends?
